## Agenda

- Spend ~10m digesting feedback from your partner(s)
- ~20m discussion of each project
- ~10m end-of-class debrief 
- Preview of next time 

## <span class="alert">Instructions</span> for the workshop

1. Read through the [document](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FPm0Tfysp5gJ3UlXzv7nxLFGHmzg8SIa26x2hxY5gtg/edit#gid=0) shared with you by your partner.
- If you have questions about their feedback, make a comment in the document.

2. In groups: 
  - Decide who will go first and have that person do a brief overview of their feedback.
  - Discuss the feedback, being sure to take notes either in the review document or another one. 
  - Switch, rinse, repeat
